attributes.action: have a Referendum on Airport Expansion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been asked to recycle, give up our cars, turn off our lights, look after our resources and reduce carbon emissions which threaten the whole planet. So why are we still expanding airports? Fair's fair if we are being asked to do so much, why is the airline industry with the OK of the Government doing so little. Leading by example is all I would asked the prime minister to do. Let all of us have a fair vote on this.
